0101000010010011 1001010000101010 0 -> sum: 1110010010111101, cout: 0
0111100000001111 0011100101110100 0 -> sum: 1011000110000011, cout: 0
1001011001001000 0000100110011111 0 -> sum: 1001111111100111, cout: 0
1001110011011100 1010011001011011 0 -> sum: 0100001100110111, cout: 1
1100001000000011 1100101100000011 1 -> sum: 1000110100000111, cout: 1
0001010110100011 1110001001110100 0 -> sum: 1111100000010111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
